===Overview===
The '''Spanish Empire''' (''Imperio español'') was one of the largest empires in [[human]] history. It reached the peak of its military, political and economic power under the Spanish Habsburgs, through most of the 16th and 17th centuries, and its greatest territorial extent under the House of Bourbon in the 18th century. The Spanish Empire became the foremost global power of its time.

===15th Century===
====Age of Discovery====
In 1492 A.D., [[Christopher Columbus (Earth-616)|Colombus]] left [[Spain]] in the Santa Maria. A member of the crew of the [[Pinta (Ship)|Pinta]] named [[Gideon (Earth-616)|Gideon]] succumbed to scurvy. However, Gideon recovered as they reached the [[America|New World]], his nature as a [[mutant]] External allowing himself to be resurrected.{{r|X-Force #37}}That year, Columbus visited an island whom he named [[Boca Caliente]] due to its sweltering heat and humidity, making it a Spanish colony (until 1898).{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Boca Caliente]]'s entry}}

In 1498 A.D., Columbus landed on Boriquén on the [[Caribbean Sea]] the island sometime around the year 1498. Spanish forces committed genocide on the Boriquén people. Horrified, [[Esteban Corazón de Ablo (Earth-616)|Diablo]] fought back against the invaders slaying all those who came onto the island. With the Spanish forced from the shores, Diablo appointed himself defender of the land, but resumed his travels across the world.{{r|Spider-Man & the Human Torch in... ¡Bahía De Los Muertos! #1|: According to [[Wikipedia:Christopher Columbus|Wikipedia]], Christopher Columbus explored the Caribbean Sea on his third voyage of the "New World" between 1498 and 1500 AD}}

The arrival of Columbus in 1492 is a disaster for the original inhabitants of the American continent. The chief agent of their downfall is disease.

===16th Century===
====Conquest of the New world====
After Spanish conquistadors first ventured to [[Costa Salvador]] from the [[Caribbean]] in the early 16th century, Captain Vidal Vasquez finally succeded in the conquest of the area in the name of the Spanish Crown in 1528 and changed the name of [[Bazuatán]] to "[[San Jorge]]" in the process.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Costa Salvador]]'s entry}}

In 1519, [[Hernán Cortés (Earth-616)|Hernán Cortés]] a Spanish conquistador.{{r|Cable #96}} travelled to the new world, later known as [[Mexico]], was being explored by Cortez.{{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}} On his travel across the [[Atlantic Ocean]], he had been accompanied by immortal [[Homo neanderthalensis|Neanderthal]] [[Cole (Neanderthal) (Earth-616)|Cole]],{{r|Cable #96}} [[Clan Destine (Earth-616)|Clan Destine]] member [[Jasmine Destine (Earth-616)|Cuckoo]] (then in the body of a Spanish nobleman) and her sister [[Gracie Gamble (Earth-616)|Gracie Gamble]] (disguised as a valet boy) (the sister accompanying both{{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}} Cortez and [[Francisco Pizarro (Earth-616)|Pizarro]]).{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Spain]]'s entry}}

Craving for their gold, Cortez had the [[Aztec]] massacred by his army, superior in technology.{{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}} Cole witnessed him destroy the [[Maya (Civilization)|Mayan civilization]] as well.{{r|Cable #96}}

In an attempt to stop Cortez, Gracie tried to enhanced her powers, resulting in her accidental bonding to the [[Demons|demon]] [[Synraith (Earth-616)|Synraith]].{{r|X-Men: Clan Destine Vol 1 2}}

By 1521, Cortés had conquered Mexico in the name of [[Spain]], overthrowing Aztec ruler [[Montezuma (Earth-616)|Montezuma]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Mexico]]'s entry}} Later that year Spanish conquistador [[Ramiro Montoya (Earth-616)|Ramiro Montoya]] discovered the area of [[Medisuela]] on an expedition into the [[South America]]n interior. [[Medisuela City]] was founded in 1534 and became the center of a Spanish colonial proovince.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Bastrona]]'s entry}}

In 1522 A.D., on the Banks of the [[Caloosahatchee River]] in [[Florida (State)|Florida]], [[Count Duende (Earth-616)|Count Duende]] attacked his cousin [[Juan Ponce de León y Figueroa (Earth-616)|Juan Ponce de León y Figueroa]], slaughtering his men and asking him for the [[Fountain of Youth]]. As de León told mocked him, stating there was no such Fountain there, Duende stabbed him and set the place for people to thinks natives had caused the slaughter.{{r|Captain America: Hail Hydra #3}}

In 1533 A.D., Conquistador [[Francisco Pizarro (Earth-616)|Francisco Pizarro]] defeated the [[Incan Empire]] and established [[Delvadia]] as a Spanish colony.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Delvadia]]'s entry}}

The Spanish empire continued to conquer the new world. A group of Conquistadors found the [[Fountain of Youth]] in the Florida swamps. The initial group that drank the water were transformed into the ogre-like immortal beings called the [[Fathers (Earth-616)|Fathers]]. The remaining members of the party bathed in the water instead, and gained immortality in return for their emotions, but were not physically changed like the Fathers. They founded the village of [[La Hacienda]] at the site of the Fountain, and when they discovered they could not leave their village without losing their immortality, they stayed in La Hacienda and cut themselves off from the rest of the world.{{r|Man-Thing #7|8}}

===17th Century===
At the beginning of the 17th century, [[Philip III of Spain (Earth-616)|Philip III of Spain]] sent ship in search of [[Atlantis (Modern)|Atlantis]], but it vanished. It was specualted to have been sank by the [[Atlanteans]].{{r|Sub-Mariner: The Depths Vol 1 1}}

===19th Century===
====Spanish-American War====
In 1895 A.D. in revolt in [[Cuba]] exploded, setting off the Spanish-American War.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2}} After the US victory [[Cuba]], [[Guam]], [[Puerto Rico]], and the [[Philippines]] came under control of the [[United States of America]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #2}}
